author: Deepa
text: Wishing you a wonderful silver anniversary ‚ù§Ô∏è

author: Kiran
text: Happy anniversary

author: Sweety
text:
So, so happy for you both! Wishing you a very happy 25 years of togetherness - and many more years filled with love, peace, laughter, and happiness.

It's always been such a blessing to have you both in our lives. Especially during the times when things weren't easy - you were always there with your warmth and care. The way you treat us whenever we come to Chennai, the way you make us feel at home... it truly means a lot. You've always given us that warmth we missed, and I'll forever be grateful for that.

So proud and so happy to see you both completing 25 beautiful years together. Here's to many, many more years of love and togetherness!‚ù§Ô∏è

author: Anu
text:
Dear Sai & Yamini. My heartfelt congratulations on your 25th Anniversary.

Sai is always a very friendly person who is always ready to lend a hand at a moment's notice. Yamini has inculcated excellent value systems in her kids. Particularly I admire her resolve in keeping true to resolutions she had made in the past.

I wish them many years of love, togetherness and prosperity. God bless them.

author: Frooty
text:
Hi Pedamma and Pedayya,

Wishing you both a very Happy and happiest 25th wedding anniversary! üíïüíñ‚ù§Ô∏èüíó

Every moment we've spent with you in Chennai is as special as you both are. You always make us feel so loved and cherished whenever we visit the effort you put into that truly means a lot.

I still remember staying with you for almost a month four years ago not once did I feel like an outsider. You gave me the same love and warmth you show to Krupa and Kummi, and I honestly have no words to express how much that means to me.

Counting down already for your 50th wedding anniversary! üòÑ

And thank you for all the jewels you have giftes us with till now ü§≠

Love youuuuuuuu both üíï specially pedamma‚ù§Ô∏è

author: G Pandu Raja Gupta
text:
Congratulations on completing 25 years of togetherness. It makes me very happy to see how far you both have come and the life you have built with understanding, care, and respect for each other.

May God bless you both with good health, happiness, and many more years of peace and companionship. Always stay united and keep supporting each other the way you have all these years.

Wishing you a very happy 25th wedding anniversary.

author: Suni
text:
Hearty wishes to both of you Yamini akkaya d Sai bava on your 25th wedding anniversary.ü•∞

May your life be blessed by God and filled with more love and happiness.

author: Priya and Vinod
text: Wishing you a very Happy Anniversary Mama and Atta üíûMay your love continue to grow stronger with each passing year. Your journey together is an inspiration to us all.

author: Babu
text: Happiest Silver Jubilee Anniversary wishes dear Sai bro to u and your loved one ü§ù

author: Sai Chandrasekhar
text: Dear Sai and Yamini, At the outset, wishing you both a very happy 25th marriage anniversary. It is indeed a momentous occasion to rejoice, reflect and renew. You both are so different and yet so similar. Sai is the boisterous, fun loving, cracking jokes and a jolly go lucky fellow while Yamini is very silent, dignified and serving all the while. At the same time, both of you are so affectionate, Caring and loving towards all - truly embodying qualities that Swami encourages in all. You didn't stop there. You inculcated many of these qualities in your children too. Excellent parenting, not to talk of the whole family taking care of uncle and aunty. May Swami bless you with many more decades of togetherness and excellent health and happiness

author: Krishnakumar & fam
text:
Dear Sai and Yamini,

Happy 25th wedding anniversary. Sending you both so much love on this very special milestone. Kamala always lights up when she talks about the summers and years you all spent growing up together in Vetapalem. Those memories are truly some of her most cherished ones.

We always remember fondly your visit to Pune right after your wedding, the joy of those early days and the many Skype calls while you were in Botswana. Through every phase of life, the warmth, care and sincerity you bring to your relationships has never changed.

We are all so proud of your beautiful daughters and the way you have raised your family All of you are have rooted your lives in seva and Swamis teachings which are an inspiration to all of us. This is a testament to your partnership, your devotion and the purposeful way you both have built your life together.

Wishing you both many more years filled with good health, joy, togetherness, and the same gentle strength that has carried you through the last twenty-five years. May the coming chapters bring even more blessings, more laughter, and more memories that your hearts will hold close always.

With lots of love and warmest wishes always.

author: Sujatha
text: Congratulations Sai and Yamini on your 25th wedding anniversary. Married for love n understanding bonded them into caring parents for 2 lovely daughters. Dear tambi n Yamini may u be blessed with peaceful n prosperous years ahead. A privilege to have such a couple in our family.

author: Ramakrishna Vtm
text:
Hi Sai and Yaminee,

We wholeheartedly congratulate you both on your 25th wedding anniversary! You are a lovely couple, always smiling and showing such patience ‚Äî a quality we all can learn from. Your children are also very loving and well-disciplined.

Once again, we wish you both a very happy anniversary and hope you have a wonderful time celebrating this special occasion with your family.

May Swamy bless you always with good health, happiness, and togetherness.

author: Vaishnavi
text:
Dear Sai Mavayya and Yamini Athayya,

Wishing you both a very very happy 25th wedding anniversary and sending you love and happiness for the next 25 years and beyond!

You both have always been like parents to us, and we're very thankful for everything you have done for us and our parents. From being there for every milestone to even the smaller everyday moments, so many of our happy memories have you both in them.

We really miss living 15 minutes away from you but we feel assured that you are always there for us no matter what. And likewise, we will always be there for you all.

Here's hoping Swami is always showering you both with blessings. We are excited to celebrate this special and momentous day with you all!

author: Suchitra
text: My hearty 25 th wedding anniversary to you both, stay happy forever. Let your love grow stronger as you grow older.

author: Roshini
text: Happy 25th wedding anniversary annayagaru and vodina. Thank you so much for all your support and love you showed me all these years. Hope you have a wonderful day with your family and loved ones.

author: Sriya
text: Happy 25th Wedding Anniversary to the beautiful couple ü•∞ Athama and Mama! Wishing you many more years of love, laughter, and togetherness :)

author: Omkar
text: Happy 25th Anniversary to my wonderful Sai mama and Yamini atta!! The love and values you've instilled in your two amazing daughters are a living testament to your partnership. Wishing you many many more years of happiness and togetherness!!

author: Pallavi
text:
Hi Sai Maavayya and Yamini atta,

I still remember the day you showed Yamini atta and said "she is your atta", I thought you were joking or trying to fool me (as you always does some pranks on us(me and Anusha) like making us believe coca-cola pond exists in coimbatore, they fetch in bottles and sell it,...so on) ...but later realised that was the truth and you told me first even before family members knew it!!.

I wish you many more happy and wonderful years of love and togetherness ahead. Happy 25th wedding anniversary!!!!

üéäüéäüéäüíêüôè

author: Anokhi
text: 25 years together‚Ä¶ that's real teamwork!üòúCongratulations to the most adorable couple.üòç

author: Krishna Kumari (pappachi)
text: May God continue to shower His blessings on you both. You deserve all the happiness in the world. Happy 25 years!ü•≥ü•≥

author: Ramakrishnan
text:
Wishing you both many more years of love, laughter, and togetherness. Happy Silver Jubilee!

ü•≥üéâ

author: Krishna charan ( kishan)
text:
Dear Sai & Yamin

Myself & Surekha are very thrilled to know that you are celebrating 25 years of togetherness on 7th December! Our heartiest congrats to both of you for this wonderful, fantastic journey! You both make a ever smiling, happy & contented couple! Both have a large heart, are very caring & loving & always eager to help anyone. You have endured the many ups & downs in this period but have handled all situations with great composure & aplomb! On this happy occasion, we pray Swami to bless you both in abundance so that you can carry on with this journey for long & keep you in good health & shape. Hope to be around to witness your next milestone of golden jubilee! Our love & best wishes for this very very beautiful & special day!‚ù§Ô∏è

author: Thulasi
text: Happy 25 years Kanna and Alludu! Thondharga Alludu ravala.

author: Mithra
text: Happy 25 years Pedhamma and Pedaiya! ü•Ç the love story that started a whole clan, and to next gen hoping we inherit some of the romance gene. üòâ

author: Lavanya Sagar
text: Happy 25th Wedding Anniversary Yamini Akkaiya and Sai Bava...Wish you both to continue to have lots of love, happiness and joyful memories together ‚ù§Ô∏è üíñ

author: Sagar
text: Wishing you both a very happy 25th Wedding Anniversary ...Sai Anna nd Yamini Vodina...

author: VENKAT RANGA
text:
They often say the first 25 years of marriage are all about bringing up your kids. I must say, both of you have done a damn good job raising two wonderful children who are so rooted, who understand the family circumstances, and who adapt so well. That's truly a mission accomplished.

As you step into the next 25 years, I'm sure it's going to be even more fun, interesting and challenging‚Äîespecially as you take on new roles: mom-in-law, dad-in-law, grandpa, and grandma.

Here's me, wishing you both a very happy wedding anniversary and a beautiful journey for the next 25 years!

author: APARNA
text:
The last 10 years, from the moment I come into this house, you have always been so welcoming. You treat me as your own and never as an outsider, and that means the world to me.

Wishing you a very happy wedding anniversary, Vodina and Annayagaru!

author: MEENAKSHI AND BADRI
text:
Ever since the day we got you married and performed your kanyadhanam, we have always treated you as our own daughter. I often tell my two sons that they have the responsibility of seven sisters ‚Äî and you hold a very special place in our family and in our hearts.

Wishing you a very happy wedding anniversary, Yamini and Sai Alludu

author: Nags
text: Happy 25th Anniversary, Akkaiya and Bava! The teachings of Sai Baba ‚Äî Love All, Serve All and Help Ever, Hurt Never ‚Äî came alive for us through the way you both live your lives. Your love, your kindness, and your unwavering support have shaped us more than words can express. May your journey together continue to shine with the same warmth, grace, and devotion that you have always shared. Wishing you many more years of love and togetherness

author: Vamsi
text:
Happy 25th Anniversary, Dear Sai mama and Yamini atta. This is a silver jubilee for two golden hearts. You are an amazing couple and a shining example of love, laughter and friendship. Your fun‚Äëloving spirit makes everyone feel at home. May you continue to keep dancing through life with great camaraderie, endless jokes and joyous smiles. Here's to the next 25 years of togetherness and mischief! üòÄ‚ù§Ô∏è

author: Priya Vutukuri
text: Dear Haasya Ratna Sai Mama and Viral Vayyari Yamini Atta, Happy 25th Anniversary! Keep blessing the world with your cuteness and smiles <3 Wishing you 25 more and beyond <3<3

author: Prasad Pallapothu and Bharathi Pallapothu
text:
Dear Yamini and Sai,

Mee 25 savatsarala vyivahika bandham poorti ayina sandarbhamuga maa hridaya purvaka pelliroju subhakanshalu mariyu deevenaluüíêüíêüíêüíêüíêüíêüíêüíê

author: Satish Babu Thummalapenta
text: Congratulations on hitting the silver milestone‚Äîyour love shines brighter every year.

author: Sunny üòé
text:
Happy 25th Anniversary, Bhaiyya and Vadina!

Really feels amazing to see you both complete such a big milestone together

Even after 25 years, the way you both vibe with each other is so natural and sweet.

Wishing you many more years filled with laughter, good health, and lots of beautiful moments ahead. Stay happy and keep spreading the same warmth and positivity around you. ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ú®

author: Venkat and Neeraja
text:
Dear Sai and Yamini,

On this very special day and momentous milestone, wishing you both a very happy and blessed 25th wedding anniversary. We pray to Swami that the next 25 years of your marriage be filled with prosperity love and happiness.

You both have always been a great source of comfort, support and happiness for all of us.

Wishing you both the very best always.

author: Sudhakar and Hyma
text:
Hi my dear Sai & Yamini, our heartiest congratulations to both of you on completing 25 years of togetherness. During this long journey, you both must have faced many moments of Love, complaints, stress, ups & downs etc etc etc. Yet, you both sailed through all these phases together to reach this milestone in the journey of life. It's needless to mention that the Invisible protective hand of Lord Sai was protecting and extending the handholding support whenever required throughout this journey.

In recognition of your unstinted faith and the resilience you both had shown, Swami gifted you with two wonderful Angels from his store house to light up your life. Your journey from hereon is going to be stress free and pleasant. Enjoy the journey ahead fully and be witnesses to the beautiful play of the Lord with renewed faith and commitment to be part of his Divine play.

I remember our childhood days spent together in Vetapalem in the midst of accomplished parents and grandparents. Of course, you are much younger to me. We cherished the company of you and Yamini & your gifted Angels whenever we met in the recent years. On this memorable occasion, we wish both of you all the very best for the journey ahead.

May Swami shower His blessings on all your family members abundantly.

Jai Sairam

author: Bhaskar Kavitha
text:
üôèSairamüôè

Sai and Yamini are blessed children of Lord Sai Baba. They always live life with a smile, come what may. There smile and chuckling laughter is divine and is infectious, think of them it brings a smile onto everyone in whatever situation they are in and carry on life with a smile. They are always cool, loving, caring, affectionate, no grudges, no hatred, no airs on hardships of life. We are blessed for their loving friendship for almost 3 decades. Baba's blessings will be with them for ages to come. From the bottom of our heart we wish them a happy silver jubilee filled with love, joy, happiness and prosperity for many many years to come.

üôèSairam

author: Datri
text:
Happy 25th Wedding Anniversary, Pinni and Babai!

Your 25-year journey together is a complete reminder of what love feels and looks like. It is a reminder of patience, love and strength that you have.

I really like the way, both of you have always stood with me and the entire family as an epitome of strength and support.

I can still reminish our summer holidays where we would spend days together at your place, which have turned into beautiful memories for now. May this milestone give more success, happiness, love and togetherness.

Wishing you the best for all the upcoming years!
